title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Lodging              Lodging       Little River Canyon National Preserve does not offer any type of lodging at this time. DeSoto State Park is located within our boundaries but is operated independently from the National Preserve. DeSoto State Park offers a motel, cabins, chalets and a campground. The state park is located on the north end of the Backcountry Area near Mentone, Alabama. It is approximately 10 miles from Little River Falls. Please contact their office for rates and availability. 1-800-568-8840. For other accommodations or other information, visit the one of the following websites: Cherokee Chamber of Commerce City of Fort Payne DeKalb County Tourist Association Fort Payne Chamber of Commerce
